attributes.action: Give more deserving people Knighthoods such as John Mcguinness, Murray Walker, Harry Patch and other more deserving people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The honours system is being denegrated and made light by the insistence of giving undeserving people honours. Christine Ohurugu a cheat for winning a medal for herself not for anybody else?

Politicians, businessman and other "friends" of the government for lining their own pockets. And z-list celebrities for who knows what.

Lets bring back the honour to our awards system. Give deserving people...real heroes...charitable people and selfless people these honours so that a Knighthood can once again be an honour to be truly proud of.

War Heroes and the brave men and women of our armed forces...ordinary people who give their time to their community and expect nothing in return.True greats ( Unlike Nick Faldo ) such as Murray Walker and John Mcguinness who are ordinary people with extraordinary lives.

Enough of this Government love in.I'm sure Her majesty would agree there are far more deserving people.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
